summary: This bill, the Supporting New Entrepreneurs and Workers By Undoing and Streamlining Inhibitors to Nascent Enterprises through Supporting Successful Efficiency Solutions Act (Supporting NEW BUSINESSES Act), mandates the Small Business Administration (SBA) to annually award three State and local governments that improve business formation processes. These awards recognize innovative policies and tools that streamline paperwork, consolidate resources, reduce redundancies, and increase efficiency for new small businesses. The bill specifies award categories based on community size.
